title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - September 10, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - September 10, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary connect to discuss an intriguing new case out of Illinois that we'll be watching, the Biden administration's new vaccine rules for small businesses and the ever unfolding Murdaugh case out of South Carolina

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
